dcterms:creator: S. Mohajerani
T. A. Krammer
P. Saeedi
dcterms:description: The 38-Cloud dataset consists of 38 Landsat 8 images, with 18 images for training and 20 images for testing. The dataset was modified to replace five images with inaccurate ground truths, and all training images were manually annotated for improved accuracy.
dcterms:title: 38-Cloud dataset
